# utils.geometry_from_connectivity { #ribasim.utils.geometry_from_connectivity }

`utils.geometry_from_connectivity(node, from_id, to_id)`

Create edge shapely geometries from connectivities.

## Parameters

| Name      | Type            | Description                | Default   |
|-----------|-----------------|----------------------------|-----------|
| `node`    | Ribasim.Node    |                            | required  |
| `from_id` | Sequence\[int\] | First node of every edge.  | required  |
| `to_id`   | Sequence\[int\] | Second node of every edge. | required  |

## Returns

| Type       | Description                   |
|------------|-------------------------------|
| np.ndarray | Array of shapely LineStrings. |
